text: Daga hitobito no nakaniha arrā no soto ni dōi no mono o mōkete, arrā o aisuru yō ni sorera o aisuru mono mo aru. Daga shinkō suru mono-tachi wa, arrā o hageshiku netsuai suru. Korera aku o okonau mono ga, sono chōbatsu o miru toki omoishiruga ī. Issai no ken'nō ga arrā ni zokushi, mata arrā ga kibishī chōbatsu o kuwae rareru koto o
